'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
' Reference to ENTDIC_TOWN if m_Town_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("Town","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("Town",m_Town_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "Name",m_Name) nvi.ValueSize = 255 ' Reference to PEKD_DEPT if m_Dept_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("Dept","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("Dept",m_Dept_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "Srok",m_Srok) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "the_Rule",m_the_Rule) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "POSTINDEX",m_POSTINDEX) nvi.ValueSize = 20 ' Reference to ENTDIC_TransportType if m_TheTransport_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheTransport","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheTransport",m_TheTransport_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to object if m_TheAgent_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheAgent","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheAgent",m_TheAgent_ID) end if nvi.oracle_guid end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & Name & "; " BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_Town_ID=nv.item( "Town").Value m_Name=nv.item( "Name").Value m_Dept_ID=nv.item( "Dept").Value m_Srok=nv.item( "Srok").Value m_the_Rule=nv.item( "the_Rule").Value m_POSTINDEX=nv.item( "POSTINDEX").Value m_TheTransport_ID=nv.item( "TheTransport").Value m_TheAgent_ID=nv.item( "TheAgent").Value else
m_Town_ID=nv.fields( "Town").Value m_Name=nv.fields( "Name").Value m_Dept_ID=nv.fields( "Dept").Value m_Srok=nv.fields( "Srok").Value m_the_Rule=nv.fields( "the_Rule").Value m_POSTINDEX=nv.fields( "POSTINDEX").Value m_TheTransport_ID=nv.fields( "TheTransport").Value m_TheAgent_ID=nv.fields( "TheAgent").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as PEKD_DIRECTION set o = new PEKD_DIRECTION set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRECTION.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRECTION.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("PEKD_DIRECTION" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRECTION.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "PEKD_DIRECTION", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRECTION.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
if not m_PEKD_TRAINS is nothing then m_PEKD_TRAINS.CloseClass set m_PEKD_TRAINS = nothing end if if not m_PEKD_DIRSTATION is nothing then m_PEKD_DIRSTATION.CloseClass set m_PEKD_DIRSTATION = nothing end if m_Town_ID="" set m_Town= nothing m_Dept_ID="" set m_Dept= nothing m_TheTransport_ID="" set m_TheTransport= nothing m_TheAgent_ID="" set m_TheAgent= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "PEKD_DIRECTION.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
if m_FindObject is nothing then set m_FindObject = PEKD_TRAINS.FindObject(StrID,InstID) end if if m_FindObject is nothing then set m_FindObject = PEKD_DIRSTATION.FindObject(StrID,InstID) end if set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
PEKD_TRAINS.Compact PEKD_DIRSTATION.Compact end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue set Town=nothing m_Town_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TOWN").nodeValue m_Town_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TOWN_BRIEF").nodeValue Name=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("NAME").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set Dept=nothing m_Dept_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("DEPT").nodeValue m_Dept_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("DEPT_BRIEF").nodeValue Srok=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SROK").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) the_Rule=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THE_RULE").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) POSTINDEX=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("POSTINDEX").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set TheTransport=nothing m_TheTransport_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THETRANSPORT").nodeValue m_TheTransport_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THETRANSPORT_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheAgent=nothing m_TheAgent_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEAGENT").nodeValue m_TheAgent_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEAGENT_BRIEF").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next Set e_list = node.selectNodes("PEKD_TRAINS_COL") PEKD_TRAINS.XMLLoad e_list, LoadMode Set e_list = node.selectNodes("PEKD_DIRSTATION_COL") PEKD_DIRSTATION.XMLLoad e_list, LoadMode exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "TOWN", m_Town_ID if not (Town is nothing) then node.setAttribute "TOWN_BRIEF", Town.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "TOWN_BRIEF", m_Town_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "NAME", Name node.setAttribute "DEPT", m_Dept_ID if not (Dept is nothing) then node.setAttribute "DEPT_BRIEF", Dept.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "DEPT_BRIEF", m_Dept_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "SROK", Srok node.setAttribute "THE_RULE", the_Rule node.setAttribute "POSTINDEX", POSTINDEX node.setAttribute "THETRANSPORT", m_TheTransport_ID if not (TheTransport is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THETRANSPORT_BRIEF", TheTransport.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THETRANSPORT_BRIEF", m_TheTransport_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THEAGENT", m_TheAgent_ID if not (TheAgent is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEAGENT_BRIEF", TheAgent.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEAGENT_BRIEF", m_TheAgent_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) PEKD_TRAINS.XMLSave node,xdom PEKD_DIRSTATION.XMLSave node,xdom end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("PEKD_DIRECTION", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("PEKD_DIRECTION", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "PEKD_DIRECTION", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("PEKD_DIRECTION",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save PEKD_TRAINS.BatchUpdate PEKD_DIRSTATION.BatchUpdate End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase PEKD_TRAINS.LoadAll PEKD_DIRSTATION.LoadAll End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="admi" then select case child case "PEKD_TRAINS" item.PEKD_TRAINS.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_TRAINS.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next case "PEKD_DIRSTATION" item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="admi" if mode="main" then select case child case "PEKD_TRAINS" item.PEKD_TRAINS.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_TRAINS.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next case "PEKD_DIRSTATION" item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="main" if mode="" then select case child case "PEKD_TRAINS" item.PEKD_TRAINS.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_TRAINS.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).id tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_TRAINS.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next case "PEKD_DIRSTATION" item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.refresh for i=1 to item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.count nid =createguid2() & item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).id tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PEKD_DIRSTATION.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let '№ поезда

TrainType public property Get TrainType() as object LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now dim tmp_TrainType as object if m_TrainType_ID<>"" then set tmp_TrainType=Application.FindRowObject("PEKD_TRAINTYPE",m_TrainType_ID) if tmp_TrainType is nothing then m_TrainType_ID_BRIEF = "" else m_TrainType_ID_BRIEF = tmp_TrainType.Brief end if '''''' Speed optimization ONLY ''''''''' Application.AddToCash "PEKD_TRAINTYPE" & m_TrainType_ID, tmp_TrainType set TrainType=tmp_TrainType exit property end if ' set TrainType = m_TrainType end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "TrainNo",m_TrainNo) nvi.ValueSize = 50 ' Reference to PEKD_DIRSTATION if m_FromStation_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("FromStation","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("FromStation",m_FromStation_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to PEKD_DIRSTATION if m_ToSTATION_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("ToSTATION","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("ToSTATION",m_ToSTATION_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "the_Rule",m_the_Rule) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "TheDesciption",m_TheDesciption) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "TheComment",m_TheComment) ' Reference to PEKD_TRAINTYPE if m_TrainType_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TrainType","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TrainType",m_TrainType_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & TrainNo & "; " if FromStation is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_FromStation_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & FromStation.Brief & "}; " end if if ToSTATION is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_ToSTATION_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & ToSTATION.Brief & "}; " end if BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_TrainNo=nv.item( "TrainNo").Value m_FromStation_ID=nv.item( "FromStation").Value m_ToSTATION_ID=nv.item( "ToSTATION").Value m_the_Rule=nv.item( "the_Rule").Value m_TheDesciption=nv.item( "TheDesciption").Value m_TheComment=nv.item( "TheComment").Value m_TrainType_ID=nv.item( "TrainType").Value else
m_TrainNo=nv.fields( "TrainNo").Value m_FromStation_ID=nv.fields( "FromStation").Value m_ToSTATION_ID=nv.fields( "ToSTATION").Value m_the_Rule=nv.fields( "the_Rule").Value m_TheDesciption=nv.fields( "TheDesciption").Value m_TheComment=nv.fields( "TheComment").Value m_TrainType_ID=nv.fields( "TrainType").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as PEKD_TRAINS set o = new PEKD_TRAINS set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_TRAINS.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_TRAINS.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("PEKD_TRAINS" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_TRAINS.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "PEKD_TRAINS", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_TRAINS.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
m_FromStation_ID="" set m_FromStation= nothing m_ToSTATION_ID="" set m_ToSTATION= nothing m_TrainType_ID="" set m_TrainType= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "PEKD_TRAINS.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue TrainNo=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TRAINNO").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set FromStation=nothing m_FromStation_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FROMSTATION").nodeValue m_FromStation_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FROMSTATION_BRIEF").nodeValue set ToSTATION=nothing m_ToSTATION_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TOSTATION").nodeValue m_ToSTATION_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TOSTATION_BRIEF").nodeValue the_Rule=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THE_RULE").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) TheDesciption=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEDESCIPTION").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) TheComment=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECOMMENT").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set TrainType=nothing m_TrainType_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TRAINTYPE").nodeValue m_TrainType_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TRAINTYPE_BRIEF").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "TRAINNO", TrainNo node.setAttribute "FROMSTATION", m_FromStation_ID if not (FromStation is nothing) then node.setAttribute "FROMSTATION_BRIEF", FromStation.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "FROMSTATION_BRIEF", m_FromStation_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "TOSTATION", m_ToSTATION_ID if not (ToSTATION is nothing) then node.setAttribute "TOSTATION_BRIEF", ToSTATION.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "TOSTATION_BRIEF", m_ToSTATION_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THE_RULE", the_Rule node.setAttribute "THEDESCIPTION", TheDesciption node.setAttribute "THECOMMENT", TheComment node.setAttribute "TRAINTYPE", m_TrainType_ID if not (TrainType is nothing) then node.setAttribute "TRAINTYPE_BRIEF", TrainType.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "TRAINTYPE_BRIEF", m_TrainType_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("PEKD_TRAINS", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("PEKD_TRAINS", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "PEKD_TRAINS", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("PEKD_TRAINS",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="admi" then select case child end select end if ' mode="admi" if mode="main" then select case child end select end if ' mode="main" if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

'строка раздела Точки доставки private m_ID as string private m_SecureStyleID as string private m_RowRetrived as boolean private m_Changed as boolean private m_Deleted as boolean private m_RetriveTime as date private m_ChangeTime as date private m_AccessTime as date private m_Parent as Object private m_Application as Application private m_name as String private m_POSTINDEX as String private m_region as object Dim m_region_ID as string Dim m_region_ID_BRIEF as string private m_area as String private m_TheNextTown as object Dim m_TheNextTown_ID as string Dim m_TheNextTown_ID_BRIEF as string private m_VolSwitchWeight as double private m_VolSwitchWeightSup as double private m_Brief as string

'Задать родительский объект 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newParent , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Parent = value friend property Set Parent(newParent as object) set m_Parent = newParent end property
'Получить родительский объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Parent public property Get Parent() as object set Parent = m_Parent end property

Application = value friend property Set Application(newApplication as Application) set m_Application = newApplication m_Application.Logger.Message "PEKD_DIRSTATION.Init" end property
'Корневой объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса Application ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Application ' Set variable = me. Application public property Get Application() as Application set Application = m_Application end property
'Разрушить иерархическую зависимость объектов 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseParents() private sub CloseParents() set m_Application = nothing set m_Parent = nothing end sub

'получить признак - считано из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. RowRetrived public property Get RowRetrived() as boolean RowRetrived = m_RowRetrived end property
'Задать Дату и время считывания из базы 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newRetriveTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. RetriveTime = value friend property Let RetriveTime(newRetriveTime as date) m_RetriveTime = newRetriveTime end property
'Дата и время считывания из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. RetriveTime public property Get RetriveTime() as date RetriveTime = m_RetriveTime end property
'Задать Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newChangeTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. ChangeTime = value friend property Let ChangeTime(newChangeTime as date) m_ChangeTime = newChangeTime end property
'Получить Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. ChangeTime public property Get ChangeTime() as date ChangeTime = m_ChangeTime end property
'Задать время обращения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newAccessTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let 'Название
'Название 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: String - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let name(byval newValue as String) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "name",name,newvalue
m_name= newValue end if end property
'Название 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа String 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as String ' variable = me. name public property Get name() as String LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
name = m_name end property ' let 'Индекс отделения
'Индекс отделения 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: String - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let POSTINDEX(byval newValue as String) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "POSTINDEX",POSTINDEX,newvalue
m_POSTINDEX= newValue end if end property
'Индекс отделения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа String 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as String ' variable = me. POSTINDEX public property Get POSTINDEX() as String LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
POSTINDEX = m_POSTINDEX end property ' let 'Регион
'Регион 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: object - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property set region(byval newValue as object) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "region",region,newvalue on error resume next m_region_ID="" m_region_ID=newValue.id ' set m_region= newValue end if end property
'Регион 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. region public property Get region() as object LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now dim tmp_region as object if m_region_ID<>"" then set tmp_region=Application.FindRowObject("ENTDIC_REGION",m_region_ID) if tmp_region is nothing then m_region_ID_BRIEF = "" else m_region_ID_BRIEF = tmp_region.Brief end if '''''' Speed optimization ONLY ''''''''' Application.AddToCash "ENTDIC_REGION" & m_region_ID, tmp_region set region=tmp_region exit property end if ' set region = m_region end property ' let 'Район
'Район 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: String - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let area(byval newValue as String) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "area",area,newvalue
m_area= newValue end if end property
'Район 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа String 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as String ' variable = me. area public property Get area() as String LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
area = m_area end property ' let 'Город
'Город 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: object - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property set TheNextTown(byval newValue as object) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "TheNextTown",TheNextTown,newvalue on error resume next m_TheNextTown_ID="" m_TheNextTown_ID=newValue.id ' set m_TheNextTown= newValue end if end property
'Город 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. TheNextTown public property Get TheNextTown() as object LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now dim tmp_TheNextTown as object if m_TheNextTown_ID<>"" then set tmp_TheNextTown=Application.FindRowObject("ENTDIC_TOWN",m_TheNextTown_ID) if tmp_TheNextTown is nothing then m_TheNextTown_ID_BRIEF = "" else m_TheNextTown_ID_BRIEF = tmp_TheNextTown.Brief end if '''''' Speed optimization ONLY ''''''''' Application.AddToCash "ENTDIC_TOWN" & m_TheNextTown_ID, tmp_TheNextTown set TheNextTown=tmp_TheNextTown exit property end if ' set TheNextTown = m_TheNextTown end property ' let 'Минимальная плотность (клиент)
'Минимальная плотность (клиент) 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: double - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let VolSwitchWeight(byval newValue as double) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "VolSwitchWeight",VolSwitchWeight,newvalue
m_VolSwitchWeight= newValue end if end property
'Минимальная плотность (клиент) 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа double 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as double ' variable = me. VolSwitchWeight public property Get VolSwitchWeight() as double LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
VolSwitchWeight = m_VolSwitchWeight end property ' let 'Минимальная плотность (поставщик)
'Минимальная плотность (поставщик) 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: double - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let VolSwitchWeightSup(byval newValue as double) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "VolSwitchWeightSup",VolSwitchWeightSup,newvalue
m_VolSwitchWeightSup= newValue end if end property
'Минимальная плотность (поставщик) 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа double 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as double ' variable = me. VolSwitchWeightSup public property Get VolSwitchWeightSup() as double LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
VolSwitchWeightSup = m_VolSwitchWeightSup end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "name",m_name) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "POSTINDEX",m_POSTINDEX) nvi.ValueSize = 20 ' Reference to ENTDIC_REGION if m_region_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("region","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("region",m_region_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "area",m_area) nvi.ValueSize = 255 ' Reference to ENTDIC_TOWN if m_TheNextTown_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheNextTown","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheNextTown",m_TheNextTown_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "VolSwitchWeight",m_VolSwitchWeight) nvi.ValueType = adDouble set nvi=nv.Add( "VolSwitchWeightSup",m_VolSwitchWeightSup) nvi.ValueType = adDouble end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & name & "; " BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_name=nv.item( "name").Value m_POSTINDEX=nv.item( "POSTINDEX").Value m_region_ID=nv.item( "region").Value m_area=nv.item( "area").Value m_TheNextTown_ID=nv.item( "TheNextTown").Value m_VolSwitchWeight=nv.item( "VolSwitchWeight").Value m_VolSwitchWeightSup=nv.item( "VolSwitchWeightSup").Value else
m_name=nv.fields( "name").Value m_POSTINDEX=nv.fields( "POSTINDEX").Value m_region_ID=nv.fields( "region").Value m_area=nv.fields( "area").Value m_TheNextTown_ID=nv.fields( "TheNextTown").Value m_VolSwitchWeight=nv.fields( "VolSwitchWeight").Value m_VolSwitchWeightSup=nv.fields( "VolSwitchWeightSup").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as PEKD_DIRSTATION set o = new PEKD_DIRSTATION set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRSTATION.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRSTATION.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("PEKD_DIRSTATION" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRSTATION.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "PEKD_DIRSTATION", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PEKD_DIRSTATION.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
m_region_ID="" set m_region= nothing m_TheNextTown_ID="" set m_TheNextTown= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "PEKD_DIRSTATION.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue name=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("NAME").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) POSTINDEX=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("POSTINDEX").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set region=nothing m_region_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("REGION").nodeValue m_region_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("REGION_BRIEF").nodeValue area=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AREA").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set TheNextTown=nothing m_TheNextTown_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THENEXTTOWN").nodeValue m_TheNextTown_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THENEXTTOWN_BRIEF").nodeValue VolSwitchWeight=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("VOLSWITCHWEIGHT").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) VolSwitchWeightSup=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("VOLSWITCHWEIGHTSUP").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "NAME", name node.setAttribute "POSTINDEX", POSTINDEX node.setAttribute "REGION", m_region_ID if not (region is nothing) then node.setAttribute "REGION_BRIEF", region.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "REGION_BRIEF", m_region_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "AREA", area node.setAttribute "THENEXTTOWN", m_TheNextTown_ID if not (TheNextTown is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THENEXTTOWN_BRIEF", TheNextTown.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THENEXTTOWN_BRIEF", m_TheNextTown_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "VOLSWITCHWEIGHT", replace(cstr(VolSwitchWeight),",",".") node.setAttribute "VOLSWITCHWEIGHTSUP", replace(cstr(VolSwitchWeightSup),",",".") node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("PEKD_DIRSTATION", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("PEKD_DIRSTATION", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "PEKD_DIRSTATION", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("PEKD_DIRSTATION",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="admi" then select case child end select end if ' mode="admi" if mode="main" then select case child end select end if ' mode="main" if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub
'раздел Направление перевозки dim mcol as SortableCollection dim m_Parent as object dim m_Application as Application dim m_Filter as string private m_IsLocked as LockStyle

'Название таблицы раздела 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. ChildPartName Friend property Get ChildPartName() as string ChildPartName = "PEKD_DIRECTION" end property
'Задать родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newParent , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Parent = value friend property Set Parent(newParent as object) set m_Parent = newParent end property
'Получить родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Parent public property Get Parent() as object set Parent = m_Parent end property
'Задать корневой объект 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newApplication , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Application = value friend property Set Application(newApplication as object) set m_Application = newApplication m_Application.Logger.Message "PEKD_DIRECTION.Init" end property
'Получить корневой объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса Application ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Application ' Set variable = me. Application public property Get Application() as Application if m_Parent is nothing then set Application = me else set Application = m_Application end if end property
'Задать дополнительный фильтр коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN] newFilter , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Filter = value public property Let Filter(byval newFilter as string) m_Filter = newFilter Refresh end property
'Получить значение фильтра 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Filter public property Get Filter() as string Filter = m_Filter end property
'Разрушить иерархическую связку с родительскими объектами 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseParents() private sub CloseParents() set m_Application = nothing set m_Parent = nothing end sub
'Добавить строку в раздел (но не в базу данных) 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ID , тип параметра: string="" - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса PEKD_DIRECTION ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as PEKD_DIRECTION ' Set variable = me.Add(...параметры...) Public function Add(optional ID as string="") as PEKD_DIRECTION dim LID as string dim o as PEKD_DIRECTION if ID="" then LID = createguid2() else LID = left(ID,38) endif on error resume next if mcol.count > 0 then if mcol.item(Lid) is nothing then goto addnew else set Add = mcol.Item( LID) exit function end if end if addnew: set o = new PEKD_DIRECTION o.ID =LID o.RowRetrived = False Set o.Parent = Me Set o.Application = Me.Application me.application.AddToCash childPartName & lid , o set add = o mcol.AddItem o,o.ID set o = nothing end function
'Получить строку раздела 'Parameters: '[IN] ID , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса PEKD_DIRECTION ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as PEKD_DIRECTION ' Set variable = me.Item(...параметры...) Public function Item(byval ID as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION Attribute Item.VB_MemberFlags = "200" on error resume next dim o as PEKD_DIRECTION If Not mCol.Item(ID) Is Nothing Then Set o = mCol.Item(ID) set Item = o set o = nothing exit function end if end function
'Найти строку по идентификатору в дочерней иерархии 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object, i as long if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function If Not application.MTZSession.IsDescendant(StrID, ChildPartName) Then Exit Function if StrID = ChildPartName then set m_FindObject = Item(Instid) if not m_FindObject is nothing then goto OK end if for i = 1 to Count set m_FindObject = Item(i).FindObject(StrID,InstID) if not m_FindObject is nothing then exit for next OK: set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing end function
'Оптимизировать использование памяти 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() dim i as long for i = 1 to Count Item(i).Compact next end sub
'Задать поле по которому будем сортировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Name , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Sort = value public property let Sort(byval Name as string) mcol.Sort name end property
'Получить значения поля - основы сортировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Sort public property get Sort() as string Sort = mcol.sortname end property

'Returns: ' объект класса PEKD_DIRECTION ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as PEKD_DIRECTION ' Set variable = me.GetEQ(...параметры...) Public function GetEQ(byval Value as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION set GetEQ = mcol.getEQ(Value) end function

Public function GetLE(byval Value as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION set GetLE = mcol.getLE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... Public function GetLT(byval Value as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION set GetLT = mcol.getLT(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... Public function GetGE(byval Value as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION set GetGE = mcol.getGE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса PEKD_DIRECTION ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as PEKD_DIRECTION ' Set variable = me.GetGT(...параметры...) Public function GetGT(byval Value as variant) as PEKD_DIRECTION set GetGT = mcol.getGT(Value) end function

Public function GetEQPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetEQPos = mcol.getEQpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... Public function GetLEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLEPos = mcol.getLEpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetLTPos(...параметры...) Public function GetLTPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLTPos = mcol.getLTpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetGEPos(...параметры...) Public function GetGEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetGEPos = mcol.getGEpos(Value) end function
